title: The Silent Reset
story_summary: The Innovators erase all BCI scores overnight. Stenograd freezes as systems stop working. Chaos spreads. Neighbors start to trade and make new rules. The Directorate demands emergency control. Small groups argue over what comes next while the whole city waits for a sign of order or freedom.

official.headline: System Maintenance Pause
official.anchor_line: Access to select city services is temporarily paused as vital updates are deployed for urban infrastructure.
official.contextual_reframing: Scheduled optimization work ensures continued reliability and efficiency for all residents.

official.headline: Calm Adaptation Seen
official.anchor_line: City residents respond efficiently as daily routines adjust to the temporary BCI maintenance period.
official.contextual_reframing: Community resilience is evident as neighbors collaborate and uphold order during adaptive scheduling.

official.headline: Council Restores Order
official.anchor_line: The Council announces completion of the BCI system reset, ensuring integrity and fairness for all.
official.contextual_reframing: This decisive action reinforces trust in Stenograd's governance, promoting unity and renewed social balance.

underground.headline: Vanished Overnight
underground.anchor_line: People woke up locked out of homes, work, even clinics - no warning, no help.
underground.contextual_reframing: The system was always watching... until it blinked. Bodies in the corridor last night said more than any broadcast could.

underground.headline: Blank Screens, No Answers
underground.anchor_line: City displays flicker out - no guidance, just silent chaos at every checkpoint.
underground.contextual_reframing: Rumors of a secret reset spread fast. This blackout isn't maintenance. It's a cover-up, and we all feel it.

underground.headline: Reset Changes Everything
underground.anchor_line: BCI data wiped by order of the hidden Council. Directorate calls for force. Streets ruled by barter groups now.
underground.contextual_reframing: Trust in the system is gone. Stenograd stands between control and something entirely new - if we dare take it.
